item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: blogdown blog entries use the bookdown package, based on RMarkdown, itself using the markdown synthax. Some functions (like figure numbering) will only be available while building/serving the website, not when knitting the document. R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

item.title: Contact
item.description: Wanna carry this workshop or give feedback? contact me via email at julien.colomb [at] fu-berlin.de

item.title: Julien Colomb
item.description: About me I am the teacher in this course. Former neurobiologist, I specialised in data management and open science during the last 5 years. My project I have none here My data flow I have none here other This page can be used as a template!
